patthana16.19:4.1: Kusalaṃ cittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nacittasaṃsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.19:4.2: Kusalaṃ cittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nacittasaṃsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.19:4.3: Kusalaṃ cittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naabyākato nacittasaṃsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.19:4.4: Kusalaṃ cittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nacittasaṃsaṭṭho ca naabyākato nacittasaṃsaṭṭho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.19:4.5: Kusalaṃ cittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nacittasaṃsaṭṭho ca naakusalo nacittasaṃsaṭṭho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana16.19:5.1: Akusalaṃ cittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nacittasaṃsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.19:5.2: Akusalaṃ cittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nacittasaṃsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.19:5.3: Akusalaṃ cittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naabyākato nacittasaṃsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.19:5.4: Akusalaṃ cittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nacittasaṃsaṭṭho ca naabyākato nacittasaṃsaṭṭho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.19:5.5: Akusalaṃ cittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nacittasaṃsaṭṭho ca naakusalo nacittasaṃsaṭṭho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana16.19:6.1: Abyākataṃ cittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nacittasaṃsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.19:6.2: Abyākataṃ cittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nacittasaṃsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.19:6.3: Abyākataṃ cittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nacittasaṃsaṭṭho ca naakusalo nacittasaṃsaṭṭho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana16.19:7.1: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate terasa.
